text: Asia Argento (; born Aria Maria Vittoria Rossa Argento; 20 September 1975) is an Italian actress, singer, writer, DJ, model, activist and director. She is the daughter of filmmaker Dario Argento. Argento is best known for her roles in the movies XXX (2002), Land of the Dead (2005) and Marie Antoinette (2006). Argento was in a relationship with celebrity chef Anthony Bourdain from early 2017 until his suicide in 2018. In the #MeToo movement she is thought to be one of the most vocal leaders of the movement. She was one of the many women abused by Harvey Weinstein. In August 2018, an article published in The New York Times revealed that she sexually assaulted Jimmy Bennett, a then 17-year- old actor and musician, in a California hotel in 2013, and arranged to pay $380,000 to her accuser. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian political activists Category:Political writers Category:Italian models Category:Italian DJs Category:Italian movie directors Category:Actors from Rome Category:Writers from Rome
title: Asia Argento
